headline: How Waters’ (WAT) Surging Pharma Demand and Revenue Beat Could Reshape Its Investment Narrative
summary: Waters Corporation recently reported a strong quarter, with an 8.9% year-over-year increase in revenue that surpassed analysts' expectations by 3.3%, fueled by robust instrument replacement demand from large pharmaceutical and CDMO customers. This performance stands out even more given a contrasting weaker quarter reported by peer Bruker, highlighting Waters' momentum in core life sciences markets. With Waters outperforming analyst expectations thanks to significant pharma and CDMO...
